title: Pendant, mid-19th century
medium: Gold, black and white enamel, aquamarines.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Pendant of three curving panels ornamented in black and white enamel in floral design above three pieces of aquamarine and below an ornament of three leaves; loop at top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pendant, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Gold, black and white enamel, aquamarines.. Gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1920-19-157.
